---
name: Living Ancestor
type: CH
speed: n/a
armour: n/a
cc: n/a
ff: n/a
special_rules:
  - inspiring
notes:
  |
    The formation that includes the Living Ancestor may ignore the -1 Action test penalty when it tries to retain the initiative. If added to an infantry unit the Living Ancestor will also have the _invulnerable save_ ability.
---
